March 8, 2020 D scaba Spring Contest (Ungraded Section)
scaba Spring Contest (Ungraded Section) 50 March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Spring Contest scaba-spring-contest-ungraded-section
None
March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Attenborough Centre for the Creative Arts, University of Sussex Best March - Cranbrook Conductor’s Prize – Ian Lanceley Best Instrumentalist – Vicky Mace (cornet), Cranbrook
*The Ungraded Section is for bands that choose not to enter the Regional contests of the National Championships of GB (or the equivalent in their home country), and therefore do not have a National grading. Ungraded bands may include players of any age, and registration is not required.
Jan. 22, 2020, 10:21 a.m. March 8, 2020, 9:29 p.m.
1 Cranbrook Town Band Ian Lanceley Renaissance
2 Shepway Brass Academy Paul Driscoll A Malvern Suite
